public class ItemFormatter
extends java.lang.Object

$Id: ItemFormatter.html,v 1.2 2004/11/06 16:16:40 matt Exp $
Class to format an ItemIF object as text, before it is sent to a StoryHandler.

Method Detail

format

public static java.lang.String format(int format,
                                      de.nava.informa.core.ItemIF item)
Format an ItemIF according to the specified format.

Parameters:
format - The (integer) ID of the format to use. These are specified as static fields towards the top of this file.
item - The Item to format (implements ItemIF).
Returns:
The formatted String.
